meanings.definition: The number that is one more than seventeen and one less than nineteen.
meanings.sent1: She celebrated her eighteenth birthday with a big party.
meanings.sent2: There are exactly eighteen students in the classroom.
meanings.sent3: The bakery mistakenly baked eighteen cakes instead of eight.
meanings.sent4: In a game of golf, scoring eighteen is considered a perfect round.
meanings.sent5: The clock struck eighteen times, signaling the end of the day.

meanings.definition: A group or set of eighteen individuals or things.
meanings.sent1: The soccer team consisted of eighteen players.
meanings.sent2: There were eighteen apples in the basket.
meanings.sent3: The zoo had a special exhibit with eighteen penguins.
meanings.sent4: The choir performed beautifully with all eighteen members singing in harmony.
meanings.sent5: The classroom had exactly eighteen desks, one for each student.
